mapper.update: update tbl_worktime set stime = sysdate, status = 1 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 0 and fk_member_idx = 3
update tbl_worktime set etime = sysdate, status = 2 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 1 and fk_member_idx = 3
mapper.select: select wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select rownum as rno, wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx where m.status = 1 order by wt_idx desc )V )T where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno}

select wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select rownum as rno, wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx where m.status = 1 and substr(wt_date,4,2) = #{month} order by wt_idx desc )V )T where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno}
select count(*) from tbl_worktime where status = 1
select count(*) from tbl_worktime where status = 1 and substr(wt_date,4,2) = #{month}

select t.idx as tidx, t.name as tname, tw.idx as twidx, tw.status as twstatus, m.idx as midx, m.userid as userid, m.name as username, m.img as img from tbl_team t join tbl_teamwon tw on t.idx = tw.fk_team_idx join tbl_member m on tw.fk_member_idx = m.idx where t.idx = #{tidx} and tw.status = 1 order by tw.idx
